p: Plants play a very important role in the treatment of cancer. This is because many plant species possess novel chemicals that act as anticancer agents. The plant derived anticancer agents are shown to exhibit less side effects compared to many chemotherapeutic agents [ 16]. In past years, herbs were used as a major treatment for various cancers in different including countries in Europe and the Middle East. According to various reports from the World Health Organization, many countries use herbal medicine as an approved cancer treatment.
